channel.title: Anyone look at steam lately...?

item.title: Anyone look at steam lately...?
item.dc:creator: Minggut
item.description:
func_random:

Knowyourmeme does not make you an Internet Veteran. You need field experience, so go to 4chan, and if you keep your sanity and can immerse and conform yourself into the greater Internet culture, we will award you with the “Petty Lower Minor Basic Sub-Beginner Starter Internets Ribbon” :3

Facepalm, did I drunk post angry opinions on an internet forum again? FUCKING EGGNOG. Sorry everyone, I went too far on the homemade 'nog. TOO MUCH BRANDEH. AH VOMITS NAO K THNKX LOL.

4Chan is the shit BTW lol. Anonymous will get you!

Merry Christmas to everyone I picked an argument with… Door you’re pretty SRS… cool off bro, don’t take my shit for SRS. I’ll post when I’m high next time LOLOLOLOL, I’ll just agree with you.

BTW what ribbon do you get for using the net since 1995? :3

P.S. Func_random, you should hang in the 4chan /b forum lolololol

TheeGoatPig:

Stalker is awesome. I love it. But Clear Sky keeps crashing on my PC. It’s not the games fault though. Every 3d game crashes this PC. I wish I knew why…

If you’re using an Nvidia card, go to the little window that you can pull up when you rightclick on the desktop and set the slider to “Performance”. Fixed my Fallout 3 errors.

Sitten_duck:

I love steam. I just bought Audiosurf for myself and two friends. I was tallying up all the games I’ve purchased for myself and friends, and I have paid only 30% of what I would have paid at full price at the time the game was on sale. I’ve paid an average of $3.15 a game for the 26 games I’ve purchased since I got Steam, and most of those games are Valve titles.

AUDIOSURF THE BONK! SONG.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N8XglQpGYOE

Read full topic

CS can be good if SoC is still fresh in your mind. Most of the maps revisit old SoC maps.
